member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Sets the health of the zombie to 0.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified health value.
member.param: The initial health of the zombie. Must be greater than or equal to 0.
member.exception: Thrown when the value is less than 0.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.GetHealth
member.summary: Returns the health value of a Zombie object.
member.returns: The value of health of the Zombie object.

member.name: P:Enemies.Zombie.Name
member.summary: Retrieves and sets the name value of the zombie.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the zombie's attributes.
member.returns: A formatted string containing the zombie's name and health.
